caption: Top notch bbq! This stuff is amazing.
Very tasty, the guy behind the counter was great. I had the pulled turkey. Amazing.  The kale and baked beans are delicious.  Even the corn bread was good.
Gosh, that was good!

Well I didn’t even get to try the food. Came looked over the menu made eye contact with one of the workers. Proceeded to wait several more minutes with nothing not even a greeting, a “I will be with you in a a moment”.Absolutely nothing, so I left. I will not spend my money at a place that can’t even manage simple service industry etiquette.
The food was fantastic and there was a stunning brunette girl that was very helpful. Great place for a quick bite!
I certainly enjoy the dishes and customer service, good area next to my apartment. The staff members are always very nice. I highly recommend this place.
I tried this place before with my friend and I am obsessed ever since. I love the great vibes and flavorful dishes and drinks. Kudos.

Great concept, weak execution. I was lured by the images of BBQ sliced turkey breast which they were unfortunately out of as well as the brisket. I ordered the “BBQ pulled turkey” with sides that were chosen for me.  Had a quick convo with staff at the very empty Dekalb market and told her it was hard for me to digest dark meat. She didn’t reply but mentioned she added a sample of cheese cake. I liked the cafeteria style metal tray takeout but it leaked and I only carried the bag outside to eat.  Opening it, I understand why it leaked. She didn’t strain the food thru a slotted spoon so everything was drowning in sauce. The turkey was all dark meat which wouldn’t have been bad if it had any bbq type flavor. Either smoked, brined the meat or spice or liquid smoke in sauce. None of that and they were chunks of turkey I had to cut with a plastic knife- pulled meat allows more surface area for sauce to absorb. Beans were bland, cole slaw unremarkable- not sure why it’s chopped- another issue with way they cut up the food so it doesn’t soak up dressing. The meal tasted mostly of vinegar and sugar. And with the all dark meat, my stomach hurt afterwards... so much for healthy-ish BBQ.

Who makes food this good besides my grandmother?  The cornbread - so good! The Turkey and Brisket dee-lish and they even make kale taste great!  I hope they open more locations / make wider delivery happen. I want more.  Now.

A friend recently went through a medical procedure during Covid.  Nothing made him feel better being at home than home style cooking that Pulkies has to offer.  I sent an order to him and he was overjoyed with the sliced brisket and he raved about the Mac ‘n Cheese kugel.  Remote ordering and delivery was a breeze.  Thank you Pulkies!
They offer a fantastic variety of delicious food. I liked dining here. The employees are always kind, rates are affordable and the place is always well organised.

$16 for very minimal meal (1/2 serving). I honestly thought there's been a mistake in packaging my beef sandwich order with sides. 1 small bun with too many sauces (which is confusingly marketed as 3 sides). Wont recommend for someone looking for full meal.
Food is incredible. Must visit. Loooooove.
Order the Brisket, Cornbread, and Cucumber Salad! Don’t share it. Then you can have a few meals that will put you in grandma-made-your-favorite-foods bliss for days.
Delicious food and incredible service!! I received my food in no time and the staff made me feel comfortable and made sure I was well fed. These guys are the BEST

Pulkies has nailed the concept of Jewish-style BBQ. This is not boring Thanksgiving turkey. This playful, casual spot knows how to make flavorful turkey with sides to die for. I'd recommend the bbq pulled turkey sandwich and cucumber salad but you really can't go wrong. Making it my mission to try each and every menu item.

The most unique and delicious menu I've had in a long time. The turkey and chopped beef are so good. I got a sandwich kit and it tasted great but I didn't even need it, I could just eat the meat on its own. BEST CORNBREAD IN NYC without question! And those blondies are dangerous.  I tried most of the menu and can't wait to try the rest. A new go to for sure.

The food here is awesome! Fun, light-hearted, but the care is evident.  I have never had turkey and brisket so juicy and tender.  The menu has all of my favorite foods; I could eat here everyday. And I might!
Incredible food - quick and speedy service. How do more people not know about Pulkies!?

$20 gets you enough food to fill up 1/5 of your stomach. Nonsense small cup of brisket, tiny public school cafeteria bun, tiny basic pickles, unnecessary amount of mustard, and salty cornbread. This is not soul food, country, southern or bbq. You will be paying their rent for a tiny amount of food. Despicable!!
